text: Vasile Lucaciu National College () is a public day school for students aged 10 to 19, established in 1962 and located in Baia Mare, Romania. The college is named after Vasile Lucaciu, a Greek Catholic priest and advocate. It includes a gymnasium as well as a high school. ==Former names== * Medium School No. 3 () between 1962 and 1965 * High School No. 3 () between 1965 and 1971 * High School Mathematics and Physics No. 1 () between 1971 and 1982 * Industrial High School No. 8 () between 1982 and 1990 * Vasile Lucaciu High School () between 1990 and 1999 * Vasile Lucaciu National College () since 1999 Category:Educational institutions established in 1962 Category:Schools in Maramureș County Category:Buildings and structures in Baia Mare Category:National Colleges in Romania Category:1962 establishments in Romania
title: Vasile Lucaciu National College
